"The Kuro within the Kuro!":
"I have heard that there is an enemy
that tells the name of Kuro...
I am filled with intense anger! Meow!
But, according to rumours, it is
quite a strong guy... In anticipation of <%me>,
there is a request for you!
In place of me, could you go and get them to say it?

*Target the Chrome Dragon of Lv.1 or higher"

"クロの名をかたるエネミーがいると聞いて
オレっち、激おこぷんぷん丸なのみャ！
でも、噂によると結構手強いヤツだとか……
<%me>を
見込んで頼みがあるみャ！
オレっちの代わりに、そいつを
ぎゃふんと言わせてくれないかみャ？

※Lv.1～のクローム・ドラゴンが対象"
